import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Card, Icon, Divider} from 'semantic-ui-react' const BlastCard = (props) => { return ( Blast content: Date Sent: {props.blast.date_sent}
Time Sent: {props.blast.time_sent}
Blast content: {props.blast.body} Fans reached: {props.num_of_fans}
Avg link click time: Total link clicks: ) } export default BlastCard
